diff: +    addOptionComponent(panel, new BooleanOptionComponent(OptionConstants.WARN_IF_COMPIZ,
+                                                         "Warn If Compiz Detected", this,

+ "Whether DrJava should warn the user if Compiz is running.
"+
+                                                         "Compiz and Java Swing are incompatible and can lead to crashes.</html>"));
+    addOptionComponent(panel, new BooleanOptionComponent(OptionConstants.DIALOG_AUTOIMPORT_ENABLED,
+                                                  "Enable the \"Auto Import\" Dialog", this,

+ "Whether DrJava should open the \"Auto Import\" dialog when
"+
+                                                  "an undefined class is encountered in the Interactions Pane.</html>"));
+    addOptionComponent(panel, new BooleanOptionComponent(OptionConstants.DIALOG_DRJAVA_ERROR_POPUP_ENABLED,
+                                                  "Show a notification window when the first DrJava error occurs", this,

+ "Whether to show a notification window when the first DrJava error occurs.
"+
+                                                  "If this is disabled, only the \"DrJava Error\" button will appear.</html>"));
+    addOptionComponent(panel, new BooleanOptionComponent(OptionConstants.FIND_REPLACE_FOCUS_IN_DEFPANE,
+                                                  "Put the focus in the definitions pane after find/replace", this,

+ "Whether to put the focus in the definitions pane after doing a find or replace operation.
"+
+                                                  "If this is not selected, the focus will be in the Find/Replace pane.</html>"));
+    addOptionComponent(panel, new BooleanOptionComponent(OptionConstants.SHOW_CODE_PREVIEW_POPUPS,
+                                                  "Show Code Preview Popups", this,

+ "Whether to show a popup window with a code preview when the mouse is hovering
"+
+                                                  "over an item in the Breakpoints, Bookmarks and Find All panes.</html>"));
+    addOptionComponent(panel, new BooleanOptionComponent(OptionConstants.DIALOG_COMPLETE_SCAN_CLASS_FILES,
+                                                  "Scan Class Files For Auto-Completion After Each Compile", this,
+                                                  "Whether to scan the class files after a compile to generate auto-completion class names.\n"+
+                                                         "Enabling this option will slow compiles down."));
+    addOptionComponent(panel, new BooleanOptionComponent(OptionConstants.DIALOG_DRJAVA_ERROR_POPUP_ENABLED,
+                                                  "Show a notification window when the first DrJava error occurs", this,

+ "Whether to show a notification window when the first DrJava error occurs.
"+
+                                                  "If this is disabled, only the \"DrJava Error\" button will appear.</html>"));
+    addOptionComponent(panel, new BooleanOptionComponent(OptionConstants.DIALOG_GOTOFILE_FULLY_QUALIFIED,
+                                                  "Display Fully-Qualified Class Names in \"Go to File\" Dialog", this,
+                                                  "Whether to also display fully-qualified class names in the \"Go to File\" dialog.\n"+
+                                                         "Enabling this option on network drives might cause the dialog to display after a slight delay."));
+    addOptionComponent(panel, new BooleanOptionComponent(OptionConstants.DEBUG_AUTO_IMPORT,
+                                                  "Auto-Import after Breakpoint/Step", this,

+ "Whether the Debugger should automatically import packages
"+
+                                                  "and classes again after a breakpoint or step.</html>"));
